GameEngine
Class Game.ResourceLoader

java.lang.Object
  GameEngine.Game.ResourceLoader
Enclosing class:
Game
public class Game.ResourceLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class is purely used to call the load() method for loading GameTextures and loadFont() for initilising fonts that will be used in the game. Please note that some very large images might not load depending on your graphics hardware. For this reason it is suggested that you use an image editor to breakup your large image into smaller ones and load those individually.

Method Detail

loadFont

public GameFont loadFont(java.awt.Font f)
Initializes a font for rendering during the renderStep. In order to use a font during rendering you need to load up the font with this method and then use it with th draw method in GameDrawer

loadTexture

public GameTexture loadTexture(java.lang.String fileName)
Texture loader utilizes JOGL's provided utilities to produce a texture. This is the same is the load() function

Parameters:
fileName - relative filename from execution point
Returns:
a GameTexture ready for use or null is loading failed

load

public GameTexture load(java.lang.String fileName)
Texture loader utilizes JOGL's provided utilities to produce a texture.

Parameters:
fileName - relative filename from execution point
Returns:
a GameTexture ready for use or null is loading failed
